title: M4: Does domain specific NMT requiere pre-editing? (1)
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: intermediate. * SUPERVISION: teacher-guided. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 30 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: none. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not necessary. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: Choose a domain of particular interest in the course you are giving, search for a corpus in Opus (https://opus.nlpl.eu/) with the appropriate language combination, and train an NMT engine with MultiTraiNMT. Use this engine to translate a text you have dealt with in class and discuss to what extent translation errors could have been avoided by pre-editing the text.
